Title: Requires the inspection of non-fireproof buildings and compliance with the New York property maintenance code
Summary: Requires the inspection of non-fireproof buildings every three years; requires compliance with the New York property maintenance code; requires those dwellings not in compliance with such code at the time of inspection to make repairs or improvements necessary to comply with such standards within six months of such inspection, or a lien shall be placed upon the dwelling.
LawCode: Add ยง140-a, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to requiring the inspection of non-fireproof buildings and compliance with the New York property maintenance code
